sampleProducts.name: Bamboo Water Bottle
sampleProducts.description: Eco-friendly reusable water bottle made from sustainable bamboo. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours.
sampleProducts.usageInstructions: Wash before first use. Hand wash only with mild soap. Do not microwave or freeze. Not dishwasher safe. Perfect for water, juice, and cold beverages.
sampleProducts.recyclingInfo: 100% biodegradable bamboo material. At end of life, remove metal cap and compost the bamboo body. Metal parts can be recycled separately. Return to manufacturer for proper disposal.

sampleProducts.name: Recycled Plastic Storage Box
sampleProducts.description: Durable storage container made from 100% recycled ocean plastic. Stackable design.
sampleProducts.usageInstructions: Suitable for dry storage only. Clean with damp cloth. Stackable for space saving. Maximum load capacity: 5kg.
sampleProducts.recyclingInfo: Made from recycled plastic. Fully recyclable at end of life. Place in plastic recycling bin or return to collection centers.

sampleProducts.name: Solar LED Lantern
sampleProducts.description: Portable solar-powered LED lantern. No batteries required. Perfect for camping and emergencies.
sampleProducts.usageInstructions: Charge in direct sunlight for 6-8 hours. Provides 10 hours of bright light. Three brightness modes. Water-resistant design.
sampleProducts.recyclingInfo: Solar panel and LED components can be recycled. Return to manufacturer or e-waste collection center. Do not dispose in regular trash.

sampleProducts.name: Wooden Cutlery Set
sampleProducts.description: Handcrafted wooden spoon, fork, and knife set. Perfect for travel and daily use.
sampleProducts.usageInstructions: Hand wash with mild soap. Dry immediately. Apply food-grade oil monthly to maintain finish. Not suitable for hot liquids above 60Â°C.
sampleProducts.recyclingInfo: 100% biodegradable. Can be composted or used as garden mulch. No harmful chemicals used in production.

sampleProducts.name: Stainless Steel Lunch Box
sampleProducts.description: Premium stainless steel lunch box with 3 compartments. Leak-proof and durable.
sampleProducts.usageInstructions: Dishwasher safe. Microwave safe (remove lid). Suitable for hot and cold food. Leak-proof seal on all compartments.
sampleProducts.recyclingInfo: 100% recyclable stainless steel. Long-lasting product reduces waste. Can be recycled indefinitely without quality loss.

sampleProducts.name: Bamboo Toothbrush Pack
sampleProducts.description: Pack of 4 biodegradable bamboo toothbrushes with soft bristles. Eco-friendly dental care.
sampleProducts.usageInstructions: Use like regular toothbrush. Replace every 3 months. Keep dry between uses. Suitable for adults and children above 6 years.
sampleProducts.recyclingInfo: Remove bristles with pliers and compost bamboo handle. Bristles should be disposed in regular waste. Handle decomposes in 6 months.

sampleProducts.name: Metal Straws Set
sampleProducts.description: Set of 6 reusable stainless steel straws with cleaning brush. Say no to plastic!
sampleProducts.usageInstructions: Rinse after each use. Use provided brush for deep cleaning. Dishwasher safe. Suitable for hot and cold beverages.
sampleProducts.recyclingInfo: Made from food-grade stainless steel. Fully recyclable. Lifetime durability reduces single-use plastic waste.

sampleProducts.name: Portable Solar Charger
sampleProducts.description: 20000mAh solar power bank with dual USB ports. Charge your devices anywhere with sun power.
sampleProducts.usageInstructions: Charge via solar panel or USB cable. LED indicators show battery level. Waterproof and shockproof design. Charges smartphones 4-5 times.
sampleProducts.recyclingInfo: Contains lithium battery - must be recycled properly. Return to e-waste collection center. Solar panel components are recyclable.

sampleProducts.name: Jute Shopping Bags Set
sampleProducts.description: Set of 3 reusable jute shopping bags in different sizes. Strong and eco-friendly.
sampleProducts.usageInstructions: Hand wash or spot clean only. Air dry completely. Can carry up to 10kg. Fold and store when not in use.
sampleProducts.recyclingInfo: 100% biodegradable jute fiber. Compostable at end of life. Natural decomposition in 1-2 years.

sampleProducts.name: Wooden Desk Organizer
sampleProducts.description: Handcrafted wooden desk organizer with multiple compartments. Sustainable office solution.
sampleProducts.usageInstructions: Wipe with dry cloth. Avoid water exposure. Apply wood polish every 6 months. Holds pens, papers, and small items.
sampleProducts.recyclingInfo: Made from sustainably sourced wood. Biodegradable. Can be repurposed or composted at end of life.

instructions: These are sample products for testing. When adding products as a seller, use these as reference for the type of information to include.
